data.text:
So This Is Marriage (1924) - 5

The Savoy Theatre in Durham, North Carolina, showing the American drama film So This Is Marriage (1924), on page 49 of the July 18, 1925 Exhibitors Herald.

So This Is Marriage (1924) - 1 - silent film printed advertisement

Still cropped for publication for the American drama film So This Is Marriage (1924) with Eleanor Boardman, on page 353 of the January 24, 1925 The Moving Picture World. The caption stated, she "breakfasts in ... More

So This Is Marriage (1924) - 2 - silent film printed advertisement

Still cropped for publication from the American drama film So This Is Marriage (1924) with Lew Cody and Eleanor Boardman, on page 376 of the January 24, 1925 The Moving Picture World.

So This Is Marriage (1924) - 3 - silent film printed advertisement

Still cropped for publication from the American drama film So This Is Marriage (1924) with Conrad Nagel and Eleanor Boardman, on page 471 of the January 31, 1925 The Moving Picture World.

So This Is Marriage (1924) - 4 - silent film printed advertisement

Still cropped for publication from the American drama film So This Is Marriage (1924) with Mabel Julienne Scott, on page 471 of the January 31, 1925 The Moving Picture World.
